quotes: After attending one of Iglesias's concerts in March 1999, American actor Will Smith asked Iglesias to contribute a song to the soundtrack of his upcoming movie Wild Wild West;
On 8 June 2000, Iglesias came to New York and sang the song, live and unplugged, on Stern's show with just an accompanying guitarist.
In 2000, Iglesias performed at the Super Bowl XXXIV halftime show with Christina Aguilera, Phil Collins and Toni Braxton.
In 2001, Iglesias released his second English-language album Escape.

organizations.name: Interscope
quotes: Signing a multi-album deal, after weeks of negotiations with Interscope, Iglesias recorded and released his first full record in English, Enrique.

organizations.name: Billboard
quotes: becoming an international hit and peaking at number one on the US Billboard Hot 100.
The album's single 'Be with You' became Iglesias's second number-one single on Billboard's Hot 100 chart.
